channel.title: Advanced Security: Disable Control Port Filter Proxy
channel.description:
I was trying to apply the steps in the followin to workstation and gateway templatevms:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Advanced_Security_Guide#Whonix-Gateway_Security https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Advanced_Security_Guide#whonixcheck_Hardening
For whatever reason, i couldn't get it to connect to tor again. if I understand it right timesync should still work just fine (i didnt remove that one at all).

item.title: Advanced Security: Disable Control Port Filter Proxy
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Debugging inspiration:

There should be no differences - if were any - then it would be unrelated - Qubes specific - something would be wrong.

Should show minimal differences.

Read full topic
item.source: Advanced Security: Disable Control Port Filter Proxy

item.title: Advanced Security: Disable Control Port Filter Proxy
item.dc:creator: WhonixQubes
item.description:
I implemented the Whonix instructions for Disable CPFP in Qubes + Whonix…

Whonix – 18 Jun 19

Advanced Security Guide - Whonix

THIS WIKI PAGE IS DEPRECATED AND OUTDATED. PLEASE REFER TO THE ADVANCED SECURITY GUIDE SECTION - https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Documentation

And like @igijo, my Whonix-Workstation dropped its Tor connectivity instantly upon the third step of reloading the Whonix-Gateway firewall:

sudo nano /etc/whonix_firewall.d/50_user
CONTROL_PORT_FILTER_PROXY_ENABLE=0
sudo whonix_firewall

I poked around a bit further in trying to isolate the issue, but haven’t found what it is yet.

Someone more familiar with the Workstation’s use of the Tor package or Whonix firewall have some ideas.

Maybe it is a bug of sorts tied in with Qubes + Whonix specific networking.

Will have to check this out more at some point.

Read full topic
item.source: Advanced Security: Disable Control Port Filter Proxy

item.title: Advanced Security: Disable Control Port Filter Proxy
item.dc:creator: WhonixQubes
item.description:
[quote=“igijo, post:1, topic:899”]I was trying to apply the steps in the followin to workstation and gateway templatevms:

Whonix – 18 Jun 19

Advanced Security Guide - Whonix

THIS WIKI PAGE IS DEPRECATED AND OUTDATED. PLEASE REFER TO THE ADVANCED SECURITY GUIDE SECTION - https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Documentation


Whonix – 18 Jun 19

Advanced Security Guide - Whonix

THIS WIKI PAGE IS DEPRECATED AND OUTDATED. PLEASE REFER TO THE ADVANCED SECURITY GUIDE SECTION - https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Documentation

For whatever reason, i couldn’t get it to connect to tor again. if I understand it right timesync should still work just fine (i didnt remove that one at all).[/quote]

Under…

Whonix – 18 Jun 19

Advanced Security Guide - Whonix

THIS WIKI PAGE IS DEPRECATED AND OUTDATED. PLEASE REFER TO THE ADVANCED SECURITY GUIDE SECTION - https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Documentation

Which one were you trying to apply?

Static VirtualBox IP

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Advanced_Security_Guide#Static_VirtualBox_IP

Disable Control Port Filter Proxy

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Advanced_Security_Guide#Disable_Control_Port_Filter_Proxy

FYI: Generally a lot of these guides are still written with VirtualBox in mind and the Qubes + Whonix port now has a bit different networking architecture. So there may at times be conflicts with Qubes + Whonix.

Read full topic
